component.name: PlaylistItem
component.script:
function init() track = m.top.findNode("track") track.opacity = m.top.opacity end function
function updateMetadata() track = createObject("roSGNode", "Track") track.opacity = m.top.opacity if m.top.metadata.play_type = "airbreak" airbreak = createObject("roSGNode", "Airbreak") m.top.replaceChild(airbreak, 0) return true else child = m.top.getChild(0)
if same(child) return false end if
track.artist = m.top.metadata.artist track.album = m.top.metadata.album track.title = m.top.metadata.song track.opacity = m.top.opacity end if
m.top.replaceChild(track, 0) end function
function same(child) as Boolean if child["artist"] <> m.top.metadata.artist then return false if child["album"] <> m.top.metadata.album then return false if child["title"] <> m.top.metadata.song then return false return true end function
